name: Leak
description:
Survival Horror level DEMO! In this level you will impersonate a miner in his working hours. Be prepared to escape if you want to survive, you never know what the underground holds...

The game is set on the Victorian era, but in a dystopian past where Tesla Coils are used in order to power and light up spaces, along with other electric powered up items.

Be prepared for the worst and get ready if you want to survive what this underground mine holds for you...

Don't hesitate to leave your feedback and other suggestions in the comments! Remember that it's still a WIP :)

https://twitter.com/SadPug4

Enjoy!
